Title: TFS WorkItem Tracker
Description:
TFS WorkItem Tracker helps developers to focus on their tasks and control their progression.
It also helps Project Manager to visualize developments progression
HomeWiki:
TFS WorkItem Tracker helps developers to focus on their tasks and control their progression.
It also helps Project Manager to visualize developments progression in real time.
Another goal of this tool is to control workitem association to changesets.

Features :
1) List workitems and filter by state, area and iteration paths
2) Control timing on workitem progression
3) Visualize changesets associated to workitems
4) Associate workitems to changesets
5) Visualize performances by days

This version is only compatible with Visual Studio 2012

Important : This code and information are provided "as is" without warranty of any kind, either expressed or implied.
